title: (x) Similiar to Volcano King, just heavier - Puzzler {Ignacio}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050515203750im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70616.gif)   
   
(Do not ID the font in the image, suggest something similiar but heavier. I have seen it some place that I can't remember, but I'm sure it exists.)
author: jsandvik

comments.content:
Thanks, Ignacio.   
Is there yet more alternatives?
Jan, in Illustrator make Volcano King as white type and in the apperance pallet add another stroke. That should make it thicker and chunkier.

Hi Jan,   
   
If you can wait a few we've got a new font coming out as part of the Snappy hour Invite kit at the Mister Retro site which is a heavier weight, here's a little taste . . .   
   
 ![Tiki Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20050515203750im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70646.gif)   
   
I may be able to sell you a beta copy of it if it suits your needs till it's officially released . . . It was illustrated by Derek Yaniger and I fonted it up . . .   
   
Best,   
Stuart :D
